channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report X-2024060664
item.description:
Report X-2024060664

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-27T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-11
  • City: BEAVER
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package Handler carrying package by hand to work area to load onto van for delivery, dropped package resulting in 1 Gallon glass container of Ricca Chemical Company Methanol to shatter inside of package, resulting in contents leaking into package. Damaged Package Report & Improper Shipping Form completed.

item.title: Report X-2024060660
item.description:
Report X-2024060660

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-27T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-11
  • City: BEAVER
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package brought to Quality Assurance during unload, package was wet from internal leakage of product. Upon inspection, it was found that both 1 Gallon Jugs of ZEP INDUSTRIAL PURPLE CLEANER AND DEGREASER CONCENTRATE did not have a foil seal at spout of plastic jug, and were only containing liquid via a blue cap on top of jug. One of the plastic jugs had a loosely screwed on cap resulting in product leaking out of the container and into the package.
